title: Drawing, Design for a Round Dining Table on Scrolled Feet, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for a Round Dining Table on Scrolled Feet
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: DINING TABLE; at lower right of image with arrow pointing to right leg: carved; at upper right with arrow pointing to table top: Top 4'-6" DIAM
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Round molded table top with dividing stretcher across center, raised on fluted columnar support with molded double band around bottom sitting atop cross-shaped molded base terminating in scroll feet with carved floral rosettes.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Round Dining Table on Scrolled Feet, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-108.
